author: Tim Kroupa
comment: I purchased the pro version because the free one made it seem like I needed to in order to get it to sync with my phone.  But it still keeps popping up with a message to sync but will not actually sync and the info on the watch face is wrong.  I love the way it looks but it does not work so I would like to be refunded my $ or have it fixed.  No response, no refund, still now working.  Too bad, this would be my favorite if it worked.
title: Does not sync with phone

author: Leighton Coats
comment: Why is the setting screen still Prompting me to buy the full version...after I've ALREADY PAID FOR IT!!!!! come on guys, do you realize how much watchface competition you have out here? You've got to step up, man...Refund, please...
title: Not Understanding...

author: Hamid Elaosta
comment: Some of the layout issues fixed but still no weather option and the face annoyingly makes my phone show a notification to sync data to the watch every few minutes. Uninstalling, again.

reply.author: Frillroid Watch Faces
reply.content:
Dear Hamid,

kindly update to the latest app version available, It has all the reported bugs fixed.

title: Buggy & Missing features

author: Anders von Reis Crooks
comment: Keep getting hit with purchase the pro version requests, the face rarely updates, no functionality increase when you purchase the face since it doesn't acknowledge you own it. Massive battery drain
title: failed execution

author: Nik McRae
comment: Purchased pro version in order to use full functions because I love the watchface. But it still prompts to purchase pro every time. Other reviews state the same issue. Asked to refund.

author: Myk Williams
comment: Looks cool but is killing my battery. I usually get a full 2 days but with this face ill be lucky to get 5 hours. Very disappointed
title: Battery killer

author: Neil Lawson
comment: As with other users, I this face believing that some of the issues I was experiencing with the free version would be resolved. However, this has not been the case, my phone and watch do not sync and there are virtually zero options within the app to allow personalization.
title: Good Design, Poor Functionality

author: Heri Cahyono
comment: I have bought pro version and it keep telling me to go pro, didn't open all setting.
title: Keep asking to buy pro

author: D'Reil McClain
comment: It keeps asking me to sync data and then says it's a pro feature. I spent $2 so far. Not cool at all. I have a Nexus 6 and a 1st Gen Moto 360.
title: I just bought this watch face twice

author: Paul Gehling
comment: It keeps prompting me to buy app when I have already purchased it. The app will not sync asknto buy pro when i did. This is a scam

author: Sean Fantone
comment: Developer knows settings can not be accessible with "Buy pro version " card locking up settings page on what is a Pro version. Doesn't' seem to care to repair.
title: Ripoff

author: Gregory Lyall
comment: Payed for the full app,  doesn't work... Doesn't sync info across from phone to watch and keeps prompting me to pay again.....  Gg
title: Doesn't work

author: Clarence Brown
comment: Very cool design, with all the information. .but use up the battery too fast.

author: Caitlin Summey
comment: It keeps telling me to buy the pro version and i already did. Like, c'mon.

author: Omar Lugo
comment: I keep the 5 star 🌟 keep the good work
title: If you fix the pro version bug

author: Miguel Zelaya
comment: Is not enhaced for baterry life mine was drained while it was charging
title: Is not enhaced for baterry life

author: Mark Claydon
comment: Doesn't sync. Doesn't reconise that I have purchased the pro version
title: Doesn't work

author: Korban Hadley
comment: Huge Battery drain. 100% to 30% in less than an hour

author: arturo zuniga
comment: I have a Samsung Gear Live and I bought the upgrade to pro but keeps asking me to buy it again. What is going on?
title: Won't update to pro

comment: Awful. Do not buy. Scam. Doesn't work. Drains battery.

author: Sorin Costea
comment: i bought the full version but it keeps telling me to go pro 😏
title: not working on m8

author: Giorgos Vergis
comment: I bought the pro version just to change from Fahrenheit to Celsius no other options what a rip off

author: Koen Schelfhaut
comment: Very nice watchface ! I'll give it 5 stars if the developper adds the option for 24h clock!
title: Very nice!

author: Rahul Pathania
comment: bought the pro version still asks to purchase it... Can't sync data

author: John Barszowski
comment: Had a cheap one then I went pro

author: Matt Johnson
comment: Battery drainer. Pity because it looks good.

author: Carlos Arrington
comment: Si far so good
title: Beautiful face

author: Nathan Gay
comment: Nice watch face

author: David Cassar
comment: It keeps draining my watch battery really fast. If I have this face active, my watch is dead by lunch time. Shame because I really love the design.

reply.author: Frillroid Watch Faces
reply.content:
Dear David,

Update to the latest app version available, It has improved battery life. hope you will like the updated version.

title: Love the design but

author: Thomas McElroy
comment: Features such as tempature and phone  battery doesn't sync from phone. Dissappointing

reply.author: Frillroid Watch Faces
reply.content:
Dear Thomas,

To get accurate updates for the features such as phone battery and weather, sync your watch from inside the app. Update to the latest app version available, it has all reported bugs fixed.

title: Doesn't work as stated

author: Chad Zenzen
comment: Really cool design even purchased pro see if i could get face to update. I selected settings and nothing....if you get it to work live to have it. Moto 360 2nd gen
title: Really Cool Face but.....

author: Keith G
comment: Can't adjust anything on this face. I want to keep colored background on all the time...can't do it. No option to enter location so just hope it comes in right.  It's too bad because I really liked the look of it

reply.author: Frillroid Watch Faces
reply.content:
Dear Keith,

You cannot keep the watch face active all the time it will drain your watch and mobile battery instantly. Update to the latest app version available, it has all reported bugs fixed.

title: No features

author: Marco Ferreira
comment: Good design, really like it. But having the watch screen filled with empty fields is a no-no.
title: No weather/humidity and no phone battery info

author: Will Dracott
comment: Bought full version, still can't sync from phone. Told to go pro. Which I had. Doesn't work. Shame.
title: Needs fixing

author: Bob Barracca
comment: Killed the battery on my Moto 360 in 2 hours.  Waste of money
title: Killed my battery

author: Adam Bradshaw
comment: The only difference between pro and free is ability to change temp from C to F. Ripoff.
title: Come On Dude

author: Rumen Mutafov
comment: If the Pro functionality works it would have gotten 5 stars..
title: Pro doesn't sync

author: Allon Fennell II
comment: It wouldn't save the change from Celsius to Fahrenheit. It also wouldn't sync weather or battery.

author: Armani McKoy
comment: Drains watch battery and doesn't sync weathet
